sentences.en: After her mother's death, she became acutely aware of her own mortality.
sentences.cn: 她母亲去世后，她开始强烈意识到自己的生命是有限的。

sentences.en: After her mother's death, she became acutely aware of her own mortality.
sentences.cn: 她母亲去世后, 她开始强烈意识到自己的生命是有限的.

sentences.en: Are Community Education Programs Effective in Reducing Stroke - Related Disability and Mortality?
sentences.cn: 社区教育项目是否对降低卒中致残率和病死率有效?

sentences.en: Because of sin man was sentenced to mortality or a dying state.
sentences.cn: 现在神审判人仍要归于尘土.

sentences.en: Cancer, as one the common malignant diseases, has high cancer mortality.
sentences.cn: 肿瘤是一种常见的恶性疾病 、 病死率很高,化疗是主要治疗方法.

sentences.en: Conclusion Elderly brain disease with aspiration pneumonia has illness concealed , high mortality.
sentences.cn: 目的分析老年脑疾病并发吸入性肺炎的临床资料, 总结其临床特点.

sentences.en: Each, in his own way, sits quietly considering mortality.
sentences.cn: 他们都默默地坐着, 以各自的方式在思考人生的最后归宿.

sentences.en: Mortality from heart disease varies widely across the world.
sentences.cn: 心脏病死亡率世界各地差异很大。

sentences.en: Mortality is the number or volume of trees periodically rendered unusable through natural causes.
sentences.cn: 枯损是一类由于自然原因而定期变得无用的林木株数或材积.

sentences.en: Objective To improve the treatment and reduce the case mortality of tetanus.
sentences.cn: 目的提高破伤风的治疗水平、降低病死率.

sentences.en: Of course , the ambiguity of his mortality frightens him.
sentences.cn: 他会死去的这个念头一直令他害怕.

sentences.en: Source: Chan - fai Cheung , Chiu Julie, Memory AND Oblivion Meditaions on Mortality , P 31.
sentences.cn: 资料来源: 张灿辉 、 赵茱莉, 《追忆与遗忘对终极的沉思》, 页三十一.

sentences.en: Source: Chan - fai Cheung , Chiu Julie, Memory AND Oblivion Meditaions on Mortality , P 61.
sentences.cn: 资料来源: 张灿辉 、 赵茱莉, 《追忆与遗忘对终极的沉思》, 页六十一.

sentences.en: The mortality of septicemia with Vibrio vulnificus necrotizing fasciitis is very high.
sentences.cn: 因此详尽的询问病史对于?别诊断及治疗是相当重要的.

sentences.en: The mortality rate was 14 % in EOD and 4 % in LOD infants.
sentences.cn: 临床上早发性病例较多爲早産儿,容易发生败血症,白血球缺乏与呼吸窘迫.

sentences.en: We aren't gods: we must accept our mortality.
sentences.cn: 我们不是神: 要死就得死.

words.tran_cn: 凡人的；致死的；终有一死的；不共戴天的
[医]死亡数，死亡率；必死性，必死的命运

phrases.tran_cn: 婴儿死亡率，早期失效；早期故障期
产妇死亡率，母性死亡率；母死率
新生儿死亡率，初生仔畜死亡率

trans.tran_cn: 死亡数，死亡率，必死性，必死的命运
trans.tran_en: the number of deaths during a particular period of time among a particular type or group of people
